       Hell Beast fell backwards off of Rampage as Magnus' shots rained down 
on him. Rampage was hit more than Hell Beast, but the giant crab pointed 
upward with his tricanon and fired at Magnus.

       Tarantulas saw the shields shatter. And what a beautiful sight it was. 
However, the Maximals were right. The Element stood only a few hundred feet 
away and if the Predacons destroyed it, they Maximals would probly have the 
good luck of some other brand new and all powerful ship crashing into this 
area. 

--part1_12.b73af1f.280df875_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
